title: Connect problem
body:
Hey there again,

i got problem with my loading connect....for no reason cant log at the game.....and get reported for being afk.....plz check it or elp me to fix this...

replies.body: It sounds like your network can't establish communication with the game server, which can be caused by some block or weak connection.  You can troubleshoot this towards a solution by running through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  I hope that helps!
